Career Paths in Responsible Tech Part III: Industry Track

Our Spring 2024 series in Career Paths in Responsible Tech is designed to convene experts in industry, academia, and government to explore potential post-graduation career options in responsible tech and AI ethics. Each event will feature a speaker panel, followed by a small group networking session and dinner.

The Industry Panel will be held in 45-332 on May 6 from 3:30pm-6:30pm. Please register here.

Schedule

Time Program
3:30-3:40 PM Introduction and welcome
3:40-5:00 PM Panel discussion and Q&A
5:00-6:00 PM Networking session with speakers
6:00-6:30 PM Light dinner and reception

Industry Panel Speakers

Jacob Rosen, Implementation Lead, Atlanta AI

Mehrnoosh Sameki, Principal Product Lead at Microsoft
